text: Pen bɨ ogɨnap yɨb kɨli ke dad aplanun agɨl, kanɨb ak pɨyow nepal. Pɨyow nɨgɨlɨg chɨnop nɨŋɨd, Pol bɨne okok kɨli mɨdebal tek chɨn anɨb ak nep mɨdobun agɨnɨgel agɨl, gos ak nepal. Yad pen anɨgɨl kanɨb kɨlop gɨñen, kɨli Pol gup tek gɨpun agɨl, agɨnɨgel tek ma lɨnɨgab. Yad anɨgɨl kanɨb gɨñɨlɨg nep yenɨgayn.
